{{Wireless embedded system |brand=LIFX |model=Module Board |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/10/2013 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=IoT, wireless embedded board |fcc_id=2AA53-LIFX01 |ic_id=11475A-LIFX01 |us_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43362 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=D0:73:D5 |oui_eth= }} [http://lifx.co/ Homepage for '''LIFX''']
*[http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/limemouse/lifx-the-light-bulb-reinvented '''LIFX''''s Kickstarter] *[http://www.contextis.co.uk/blog/hacking-internet-connected-light-bulbs/ Hacking internet connected light bulbs] :[http://sixes.net/rdcHQ/lab/lightmapping/lifx.html Internal pictures]
* [[Texas Instruments]] CC2538 System-on-chip, :providing 6LoWPAN mesh network connectivity * LIFX LWM-01-A System-in-Package (SiP), which is basically :a [http://www.broadcom.com/products/wiced/wifi/ Broadcom WICED module] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/wiced/wifi/order_kits.php (SIP modules)], containing: :[[STMicroelectronics]] STM32F205ZG (or equivalent) :ARM Cortex-M3 Microcontroller, [[Broadcom]] BCM43362
[[Category:Internet of things]]
